results.content: Despite the subjects are a little basic for me, the course is really good, the details are presented in a good way, but in my opinion, the sections are in opposite order, as the topic "Selectors" is more basic then the topic addressed in the first section.
results.content_html: Despite the subjects are a little basic for me, the course is really good, the details are presented in a good way, but in my opinion, the sections are in opposite order, as the topic "Selectors" is more basic then the topic addressed in the first section.

results.content:
I really enjoyed this course. Especially the first 51 videos which are done by Rich Finelli. They focus on the use of selectors and declarations giving insights on how to use them.

Highly recommendable

results.content:
Très bonne formation, surtout très approfondi.
J'ai enlevé des points car je suis déçu car il y a des problèmes avec les fichiers fournis. Cela avait aussi déjà été mentionné par d'autres utilisateurs mais rien n'a été fait.

results.content: I have used other paid sites to try and learn CSS with little progress. This course is laid out really well and taught in a way that makes it easy to understand, even the more complex topics. It has been an absolute joy to go through this course.
results.content_html: I have used other paid sites to try and learn CSS with little progress. This course is laid out really well and taught in a way that makes it easy to understand, even the more complex topics. It has been an absolute joy to go through this course.

results.content: There was some really useful information in here in the first part (mastering css second edition). In the second part (css3 selectors) the instructor jumped around in both his presentation and speech, referring to the universal selector as a joker for example. The information didn't seem to be thought out or presented well.
results.content_html: There was some really useful information in here in the first part (mastering css second edition). In the second part (css3 selectors) the instructor jumped around in both his presentation and speech, referring to the universal selector as a joker for example. The information didn't seem to be thought out or presented well.

results.content: Es ist umschtändlich wenn der Kursleiter sein Lehrstoff an einer bestehenden Internet Seite, erklärt. Der Kursteilnehmer kann das Gelernte nicht sehr gut für neue Projekte umsetzen. Auch wird das Beispiel welches er benutzt mit der Zeit langweilig und jedesmal muss mann das HTML und das CSS File neu laden und sich daran tasten ...
results.content_html: Es ist umschtändlich wenn der Kursleiter sein Lehrstoff an einer bestehenden Internet Seite, erklärt. Der Kursteilnehmer kann das Gelernte nicht sehr gut für neue Projekte umsetzen. Auch wird das Beispiel welches er benutzt mit der Zeit langweilig und jedesmal muss mann das HTML und das CSS File neu laden und sich daran tasten ...

results.content: Exactly what you need to understand CSS. He even updated his first video for 2017 which gives the course value.
